review_blob: Very few I wish I didnt buy, but this is one. Aroma is nice, like a golden with spice, vanilla, some fruit, but taste is overwhelmed by some bitter, maybe metallic flaw.
beer_name: Juli Goldenberg / Monkey Paw / Stone 24 Carrot Golden Ale

review_blob: Bomber from local store. Pours deep brown with full head. Aroma is roasty dark chocolate malt, boozy heavy sweet bourbon on the back. Wonderfully smooth balanced sweetness, oak, bourbon, chocolate malt notes.
beer_name: Dry Dock Signature Series Imperial Stout (Whiskey Barrel)

review_blob: bomber from local store. Pours deep dark brown with solid mocha head. Aroma is roasty dark chocolate malt, boozy heavy sweet bourbon on the back. My favorite style, but slightly sharp and boozy on the palate.
A nice body, nice head, starts out like a very nice rich stout, but the "roasty" malt is just a little too toasty, with hints of burnt, which kills it for me.
